title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Enhancing Humanistic Competencies in Nursing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and practical experience as a manager
context.additional_context: Operated in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones for healthcare managers/leaders within organizations

learning_goals: Through scenario-based learning grounded in real cases, one can apply at least three patient-centered empathetic communication skills
By engaging in reflective journaling, one can analyze humanities-based nursing practice cases and propose improvement strategies
Through team-based project execution, one can establish humanities-driven nursing leadership strategies within an organization

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
